title: Delta Dart Starfighter
wikitext:
[[File:Delta-Dart-Starfighter.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''Delta Dart Starfighter '''
'''Craft''': Hurian Delta Dart Starfighter
'''Type''': Space interceptor
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 26 meters (long), 14 meters (wingspan)
'''Skill''': Starfighter piloting; Delta Dart
'''Crew''': 1, gunners 1
'''Crew Skill''': Starfighter piloting 5D+1, starship gunnery 4D+2, starship shields 4D+1
'''Cargo Capacity''': 48 kilograns
'''Consumables''': 3 days
'''Cost''': 350,000 credits
'''Maneuverability''': 2D
'''Space''': 12
'''Atmosphere''': 675; 1,800 kmh
'''Hull''': 3D+2
'''Shields''': 3D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 25/1D *Scan: 60/2D *Search: 12/3D+1 *Focus: 15/5D '''Weapons''': *Vulcan Cannon : Fire Arc: Front
Crew: 1 (pilot)
Scale: Speeder
Skill: Vehicle blasters
Fire Control: 3D
Fire Rate: 1/6
Atmosphere: 600/1.4/2.2 km
Damage: 5D+2 (each burst), 7D (continuous fire) *2 Blaster Cannons (fire-linked) : Fire Arc: Front
Crew: 1 (gunner, can be operated by pilot at 0D fire control)
Skill: Starship gunnery
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 2/4/7
Atmosphere: 200/500/1 km
Damage: 3D+2 '''Capsule''': The delta dart looks like an elongated A-Wing. As it uses powered-down laser cannons, the ship has more room for increased sublight speed, shields and atmospheric speed. Unfortunately the ship does not carry a Hyperdrive, or Nav computer. As yet, the imperial overloards, have not used them against the Vong, but many are ‘itching’ to see what they can do against then. In all the simulations, they have out performed many of the new republic fighters when against Coral skippers and Vong frigate analogs. The onboard cargo space contains enough ammo for the chain gun for 16 continuous rounds of fire, or 36 bursts. '''Source:''' David "Garhkal" Stairs
